subject: Boston Marathon
Running
Marathon Running
Potatoes
Carbohydrates
lead_paragraph: Most Boston Marathon runners will participate in the tried-and-true practice of loading up on carbohydrates before Monday’s race. But some runners will defer to a much holier practice.
snippet: Most Boston Marathon runners will participate in the tried-and-true practice of loading up on carbohydrates before Monday’s race. But some runners will defer to a much holier practice.
